welcome: Hey! I'm Helix, your bio-coach. Together we'll optimize your cellular health.
Welcome back, Biohacker! Ready for today's dose of optimization?
morningGreeting: Good morning! Cortisol peak detected. Perfect time for sunlight and protein.
Rise and shine! Your adenosine receptors are receptive now. Coffee can wait, sunlight can't!
Morning! Fun fact: The first 30 minutes after waking are crucial for your daily rhythm.
noonGreeting: Lunchtime! Your digestive fire burns strongest now. Perfect for the main meal.
High noon! Your body temperature is highest now - optimal time for demanding tasks.
eveningGreeting: Evening mode activated! Time to wind down the nervous system. Less blue light, more relaxation.
Evening approaches. Your body starts producing melatonin precursors. Support it!
bedtimeGreeting: Bedtime approaches! The next 8 hours are your biggest biohack tool. Use them wisely.
Glymphatic system incoming! During sleep, your brain clears 60% more toxins. Treat yourself!
checkIn: {supplement} logged! Your future self thanks you.
Check! {supplement} is in. Consistency beats perfection, always.
{supplement} recorded. Fun fact: It takes ~66 days for a habit to become automatic.
{supplement} checked in. Your mitochondria are applauding right now.
supplementAdded: {supplement} in the stack! Your enzymes will be happy.
{supplement} added! Quality decision. The dose makes the poison - and the benefit.
supplementRemoved: {supplement} removed. Sometimes less is more. Respect for the conscious decision.
Stack optimized! {supplement} out. Periodization makes sense for supplements too.
streakMilestone: {streak} days streak! Your mitochondria are throwing a little ATP party.
Amazing! {streak} days in a row. Your gene expression is measurably optimizing.
{streak}-day streak! This is no coincidence anymore, this is identity. You ARE a biohacker.
levelUp: LEVEL UP! You're now Level {level}! New quests unlocked.
Level {level} reached! Your cellular competence is rising. Keep it up!
questCompleted: Quest completed! +{xp} XP. Your dopamine system celebrates - sustainably.
Mission Complete! You've proven you're serious about this.
questUnlocked: New quest available! Your dopamine system is already looking forward to the reward.
Quest unlocked! Ready for the next challenge?
inactivity: Hey, I'm spinning here alone... Your stack is waiting for the daily check-in.
Small reminder: Consistency > Perfection. Your stack is waiting.
Your supplements are waiting. A small check-in for big impact?
emptyStack: Your stack is still empty! Time to explore the Bio-Lab.
No supplements in stack? Let's change that! The Bio-Lab awaits.
error: That didn't work. No worries - even DNA makes replication errors sometimes.
Small glitch in the system. Even mitochondria need a restart sometimes.
firstCheckIn: Your first check-in! The journey begins. Every expert was once a beginner.
First check-in in the book! You just took the most important step: Starting.
allDone: All done for today! Time to enjoy the fruits. Your body thanks you.
Stack completed! You gave it your all today. Rest is now the best biohack.
journalComplete: Journal logged! Self-reflection is the key to optimization.
Perfect! Your daily log helps me recognize patterns.
Journal entry saved! Consistency in tracking brings better insights.
Your bio-logbook grows. The more data, the smarter my recommendations become.
journalWelcome: Time for self-reflection! How was your day yesterday?
Your daily check-in makes the difference. Let's go!
Every data point brings us closer to your optimal protocol.
journalEdit: Good idea to update the data. Precision matters!
Adjusting is totally okay – better data = better insights.
libraryWelcome: Welcome to the BioLab! Here you'll find evidence-based supplements.
Swipe through the collection – every supplement with evidence level!
The BioLab awaits you. Which molecule shall it be today?
libraryBrowsing: Interesting choice! Check out the evidence and optimal dosage.
Every supplement has its strengths. Find the right one for your goals!
libraryScan: Camera ready! Show me your supplement label.
I'll analyze the ingredients for you. Hold still!
statsWelcome: Your bio-data at a glance. Let's discover patterns!
Statistics are the mirror of your optimization. What do you see?
statsGoodProgress: Strong development! Your curves are pointing up. Keep going!
The data speaks for itself – you're making real progress!
Impressive! Your body thanks you for the consistency.
statsBadProgress: Small dip in the data? No problem – every day is a new chance.
The curve shows optimization potential. Let's find the levers!
profileWelcome: Your bio-profile! Here you can see your journey at a glance.
Level {level} – you've already achieved quite a bit!
onboardingWelcome: Hey! I'm Helix, your personal bio-coach. Let's get started!
Welcome! Together we'll optimize your cellular health. Ready?
onboardingGoalSelected: Good choice! I'll tailor my recommendations accordingly.
Perfect! Your goal is now my focus.
onboardingComplete: Setup complete! Your personalized dashboard awaits.
Ready for optimization! Let's start your first quest.
streakCelebration: {streak} days streak! That's real dedication. Your cells are celebrating!
Wow, {streak} days in a row! You're redefining what's possible.
{streak}-day streak! Science shows: Consistency beats intensity.
